referenceObject.reference: Valdez-Mondragón, A., Mendoza, J. I. & Francke, O. F. (2014). First record of the mygalomorph spider family Paratropididae (Arachnida, Araneae) in North America with the description of a new species of Paratropis Simon from Mexico, and with new ultramorphological data for the family. ZooKeys 416: 1-21.
